_header: Of the blessed counselor Saint Roch
Subjects: Roch, saint; introductions, to prose texts; prayers, to saints
_description: Introductory couplet to a Latin prayer to St. Roch

BodDou1.Transcription:
Of the blessyd consellour Saynt RockeI goddes fayth as stedfast as a
                    Roke

Thompson.Note:
Hamer (1995)
